title: I Survived 200 Days as a SHAPESHIFTER in Minecraft...
author: Silver
description:
I Survived 100 Days as a SHAPESHIFTER in Minecraft... Here's What Happened

Download Monster Legends to get your free limited time reward: https://monsterlegends.onelink.me/QSYm/Silver

Follow My Socials:
• twitter: https://twitter.com/speedsilverr
• twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/speedsilver​​
• discord: https://discord.gg/uhPP2zscDw
• tiktok: @SpeedSilver

Play with this Mod by joining my Patreon!: https://www.patreon.com/speedsilver

Edited by Silver & Semit (@semitlive on twitter)

This is a Minecraft Challenge in which I try to survive 200 Days, and I can Shapeshift! There are also crazy Custom Shapeshifts like the Gorilla, Tiger and the SEA DRAGON. This is not a Minecraft Speedrunner VS Hunter, but a 'Minecraft 100 Days' challenge... This was completely insane.

Also, I had to play on 'Hard' difficulty instead of 'Hardcore' since the shapeshifter mod counted me shapeshifting as dying and deleted the world. Hopefully you guys understand!

#100Days​​ #Hardcore​​ #Minecraft

localize.title: マインクラフトでSHAPESHIFTERとして200日を生き抜いた...
我在《Minecraft》中作为shape shifter生存了200天...
